sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using RECALLd, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions, you must not access or use our service.

sections.heading: Modifications to Terms
sections.content: RECALLd reserves the right to modify or replace these Terms of Service at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes. Your continued use of RECALLd after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms of Service.

sections.heading: License Grant
sections.content: Subject to these Terms, RECALLd grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use our service for personal, non-commercial purposes.

sections.heading: Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: RECALLd is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, RECALLd and its affiliates, officers, employees, agents, partners, and licensors shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

sections.heading: User Responsibilities
sections.content: You agree to use RECALLd in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of any credentials associated with your use of the service.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All rights, title, and interest in and to RECALLd (excluding content provided by users) are and will remain the exclusive property of RECALLd and its licensors.

sections.heading: Termination
sections.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms of Service.

sections.heading: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.content: For any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at bysnapps@gmail.com
